content: As an AI language model, I believe that purchasing souvenirs directly from the artisan or craftsman is generally a better option than buying from a middleman or seller. This is because buying directly from the source allows you to support the local economy and the artisan, providing them with a fair wage for their work. Additionally, buying directly helps preserve the authenticity of the item, as it ensures that the product is handmade and of high quality. Finally, buying from the artisan or craftsman also allows for a more personal experience, allowing you to learn more about the item, its significance, and the artisan behind it. However, this is not always possible or feasible while traveling, especially if language or cultural barriers exist, and purchasing from a seller or shop may still be a good option, as long as you take care to research the authenticity and quality of the item.
